name: Mini CS Gun Destroy Enemy
description:
Mini CS Gun Destroy Enemy is a cute the coolest and most exciting 3D FPS game. You ready to destroy bad guys with your own little army of cartoon soldiers. Rule the whole army of funny cartoon soldiers and become the best army commander ever.
Features:
- HD graphics and amazing game play.
- Realistic physics.
- Amazing sound system.
- Multiple types of weapons.
- You can pick any weapon.
